resources.string:
When you are ready to start collecting values, press the 'Start Collection' button. While on the next screen, the application will record both accelerometer and GPS (if locked) values.

You should then place the mobile phone either in your trouser pocket or sock and either walk or run for as long as you wish (prefferably in a straight line).

When done, press the back button twice to end the collection and return to this screen. When you are done, you should press the 'Send Logs by E-mail' button, write a short description (optional) about the the events in the recoveries you made and send it (you may send it offline in GMail and it will be delivered the next time you have connectivity).

PS: You should only start the collection once the GPS has obtained a fix (the icon will be fixed, not flashing).
Remember: to exit back to the initial screen, you should press the back button twice
